getTicket: SELECT * FROM tickets_fact ORDER BY TicketId DESC LIMIT 1
getTicketCount: SELECT COUNT(*) As count FROM tickets_fact
getTicketStatus: Select Status from tickets_fact where TicketId=?
getTicketByStatusOpen: SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM tickets_fact WHERE Status = 'OPEN'
getTicketByStatusClose: SELECT COUNT(*) As count FROM tickets_fact where Status = 'CLOSED'
getTicketsbymonth: SELECT MONTH(CreatedDate) AS Month, COUNT(*) AS TicketsCount FROM tickets_fact GROUP BY MONTH(CreatedDate) ORDER BY Month;
